div.p: Attested information may be validated by process that are manual or automated. For automated processes it may accomplished by the system of record reaching out through another system's API or information may be sent to the system of record. This value set defines a set of codes to describing the process, the how, a resource or data element is validated.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-validation
CodeDisplay
manualManualThe resource or element is validated manually.
apiAPIThe resource or element is validated via an application programming interface (API).
pushPushData is sent (i.e. pushed) from a source of valid data to the Healthcare Directory
